text:
[Luz] We were just about
to enter the Archives.

[Luz] We were just about
to rescue Eda and King.

What is this?
Is-Is this a dream?
I'm so happy to see you.

Are Mama and the others
okay?

No! No, no, no!
Wh-When did this happen?

You helped Belos
meet the Collector.

You've been the real villain
this whole time.

Wha-- Listen,
I-I don't know what I missed,
but I'd never do this.
But I have to take you down.

This isn't a dream.
This is a nightmare.

If you think you can
keep me from my family,

[chuckles] Don't worry,
Edalyn. We're all present
and accounted for.

Hey, help me out.
We gotta find King.

No. You'll be staying
right there.

Dangerous beasts need to be
kept in cages, after all.

Bill. You crazy jerk.
How'd I get here?

I wanted to show you
our new collection.

[chuckles] But don't worry.
We saved the best spot for you.

Willow! Oh, Willow.
I'm so happy to see you.

Do you know what's going on?
I just saw Amity, and--

You know, Luz, my life changed
after I met you.

I finally believed that there
was this big, bright future
ahead of myself.

[sighs] But that didn't
last long, did it?

You destroyed my home
and any chance I had
at happiness,

I have no future now.
None of us do.

Look, everyone.
It's good ol' Luz.

And she just might be
the biggest hypocrite ever.

Everyone helped you
get back to your mom.

Meanwhile, because of you,
I'll never see my dad again.

Gus, no. I-I swear,
we'll get him back.

We'll get everyone back.
I won't stop till we do.

I never thought
about making friends
or going to school.

Then I met Flapjack.
He was more than a Palisman.

He was my best friend.
And then I lost him helping you.

But you still get to have
your own Palisman?

Why, Luz? Why do you
get to have it all?

But for the sake
of everyone you hurt...

...I challenge you
to a witch's battle.

I said, I challenge you
to a witch's battle.

But you're not Amity,
are you?

[chuckles] You're not her.
None of you are you.

How dare you?
Of course we're us.

It's "I challenge you
to a witch's duel,"
not "witch's battle."

And the Amity I know
would never misquote
the Good Witch Azura.

So come on, attack me.
I know what's going on now.

Amity, is that you?
Is it really you?

Yes.
We've all been collected,
including Camila.

The Collector came
from the sky, and--

He's playing games
with you, Luz.

He's trying to keep you away
from King and Eda.

But if you want
to save anyone,
you have to wake up.

What's the first thing you do
when you wake up
from a bad dream?

I didn't mean it.
I didn't mean it.
I didn't mean it.
Is this real? Is that Luz?

[groans] I thought you said
this would work, Ray-Ray.

You said it would
make them all "see
the error of their ways."

But King is gonna
hate me for this.
Now what do we do?

[sighs] Why bother teaching
them anything when you could
just wipe them out?
I want to be their friends.

And besides, my powers
don't work on King.

You worked
in the castle, Ray-Ray.

You've seen the big old heart,
still beating too.

When they're full grown,
they're more powerful
than anyone.

You know, I just had
an interesting idea.

Tell me, or I'll hold my breath
for a million years.

What if you played
with those three yourself?

Showed them just how much fun
your games are in person?

Then they'll all want
to be your friend.

Perhaps this will be easier
than I thought.

Ah. I thought
I'd never see you again.

How did you get back
to the Demon Realm?

It's a very long story.
I wouldn't know where to begin.

There was Belos
in the Human Realm.

Then we saw Kikimora.
She, uh, was a lot
to deal with.

And then my mom
decided to--

Whoa, how did that happen?
Uh, that's a shorter story.

Hey, hey, all I wanna do
is hear both of you talk
over hot choco's milk.

But first,
we gotta find a way out
of whatever this is.

I don't get it, King.
I really don't get it.

I thought you loved
playing our games.

Why do you choose these
itty-bitty spiders over me?

Aw, you act like
I'm doing something bad.

Trapping people
and scaring them
and controlling them,

And everyone nearly died
from the Draining Spell.

So? Toys break all the time.
You just fix 'em.

Do you not understand
what death means to mortals?

Well, don't worry,
'cause I don't want
to scare you anymore.

I think we can all
be great friends.

So let me show you some
of my favorite games.

No, I think I'll keep you
around a little longer.

I think I barfed,
like, 12 times.

Wanna make it
a lucky number 13?

If anyone can talk
some sense into them, it's Luz.

You know this can't
last forever.

I just wanted a friend
who wouldn't lie to me
or trick me.

King lied. Belos lied.
Even they lied.

"Oh, let's play a game,"
they said.

"You go down there and see
if the Titans wanna play."

So I played,
and it was great.

The baby Titans
were the cutest, just like King.

And they were all
so welcoming.

But the Archivists
were scared of their power.
So one by one, they disappeared
until there was one Titan left.

And he thought
I was the bad guy.

[Collector] He hid his egg
from me and trapped me.
But I showed all of them.

Even when those trapper jerks
started acting weird.
Even when Belos lied to me.

I found the last Titan,
and he's my friend now.

I know it's just pretend.
I don't care.

I'll pretend
as long as I want.

But that's not
what you want. Is it?

We know what it's like
to feel alone.

Hey, what if we showed you
how we became friends?

King already told me
about your adventures.

It's different
when you can see them.

What do you think?
Can we tell you
our stories?

Only one vessel is big enough
to do what I need.

[Belos]
You know what this is,
don't you?

It's the last of many,
but it still beats.

You tried so hard,
didn't you?

Willow,
help me get her down.

Wow. I thought
we would just, like,
flip through these.

So it all started
at the Bird House.

Speaking of which,
what happened to it?
Oh, yeah.

You, uh, haven't
seen it in a while.

For me, it started
in the Human Realm.

Things were not great,
but I found my way here,

and I met Owlbert,
Hooty and Eda the Owl Lady.

None of us felt
like we fit in.

So we decided
to not fit in together.
I had a lot to learn.

But after a little while,
I met more people who helped me.

That game looks fun.
I wanna go there.

This is where we play
a game called Grudgby.

[King] The ball can bite you,
and the rules are nonsense,
but it's still kinda fun.

Nonsense? Ha!
Hexside lets you play
any magic sport these days.

Grudgby was all we had,
and we made the best of it.

And you were
the star player.
We know, Eda.

[King] Did you know Lilith
was her captain?

Really? Now that's
a spin-off I'd watch.

It-It's him.
Run. Go, go, go, go.

I'm really glad you picked
this place, Collector.

It's where Eda helped me
make a connection
with the Isles.

Pfft.
A baby could do that.

Still, I've never seen
an itty-bitty spider
do it that way.

Not everyone
can recognize Titan magic.

He must really like you
if he showed you this much.

He never told me
about it, though.

Did you force him
to be your friend too?

Like, uh,
what are their names?

She didn't force anyone
to do anything.

And sometimes they just need
a little kindness
and forgiveness.

Those eyes.
Don't tell me it's--

I can cleanse
this perdition myself!

Is that Belos?
How'd he get here
without a body?

What do we do?
There's no way
we can stop that.

I get it now.
You just need kindness
and forgiveness, huh?
We can all be buddies now!

But I thought
I was doing
the right thing.

No. No, you did good,
Collector.

But this is
a little more complicated.

Don't worry.
I think it missed me.

Looks like we're gonna be
split up again.

I feel like
I should be used to
this feeling by now,

but... I still don't know
what to say.

Yoo-hoo!
You can come out now.

She just broke,
so I'll fix her.

The Archivists aren't here.
They couldn't have taken her.

Owl Lady, you know
where Luz is, right?

Back up, kid. I don't think
I can control myself right now.
I know what I should have said.

But he does get
his good looks from me.

Nice to meet you,
Luz the Human.

You can't actually be
the Titan Titan, right?

You're the Boiling Isles,
and that Titan is all--

Ah, no, nope, no.
Don't wanna do that.

If you go under
without a portal,
you really will be dead-looking.

I can't believe this.
You're King's dad.

I think King
said it best once:

"I am both King and Queen,
best of both things."
[chuckles]

This is
the space in between.

Well, in between
a lot of places.

And I've been stuck here
for quite some time.

But at least I can
keep an eye on my child.

And those who have
been kind to him.

When I saw the Collector
fly up to Belos,

I hoped with all my heart
I would see them
blast him away, and--

I was willing
to do anything
to keep my kid safe.

But I attacked
the wrong person,

dragged the Collector
down here for nothing.

Does that make us
as bad as Belos?

[laughing] What?
Have you been drinking
Eda's homemade Apple Blood?

Well, Belos says
he's trying to save humanity,

and we are saying
we want to save our families,

so isn't that
the same thing?

Don't-- Don't these feelings
come from the same place?

Well, you assume Belos's goal
comes from a genuine place.

But that man
doesn't care about anything

but his need to be the hero
in his own delusion.

And because of that,
he fears what he can't control.

And now that fear
is going to win.

[Titan]
I thought I had more time left.

But Belos will have
full control soon.

You've already
helped King so much,

so let me use
my last bit of life
to help you.

Are you sure you wanna
give this power to me?

Well, you're the one here,
and you seem like a good witch.

But I can't give you anything
unless you choose to accept it.

So the question is,
will you choose yourself?

Now, Belos will be able
to control everything,

so you have to
defeat him fast.

-But--
-My power won't last forever,
so use your time wisely.

-Oh, but what about--
-Eda the Owl Lady?

Send her my regards.
Big fan.

Don't you wanna
say something to him?

None of you have
gotten rest in days.

But what can we do?
We can't leave everyone
like this.

Luz is a Noceda.
You know what that means?

It means she's way too stubborn
to let any of this get her down.

...I think I know
how we can help,

I don't want anyone else
to go away.

I don't want anyone else
to go missing.

No! No, no, no, no!
Get off of her!

Couldn't keep me away from--
Hang on.

Ugh! I still can't think
of anything to say.

Overshot it a little.
Still getting used to
these powers.

Oh, no. Everyone's
still in the Archives.

Come on.
You can at least do this.

Concentrate.
Think of what you want,
and...

We have to cut Belos off
from the Titan's power.

You know
where magic comes from.

It's okay, Raine.
I got ya.

I am still not used to
this new look,
How long was I out for?
for I am the Good Witch Luz,

Thank goodness
you saved me from--

Yes. I was--
I was cursed with a terrible,
terrible sickness

by-- by dark magic,
just like your mentor.

It forced me to do
all those horrible things,

Don't-- Don't you want
to make peace, Luz?

You'll be just as bad,
just as conniving, just as evil

and just as unforgivable
as those witches.

We're human.
We're better than this!

Is that...
I think it is.

Dang, kid.
You do have tall genes.

Oh, your dad had
a message for you.

[Luz] And that's how
we saved the Boiling Isles.
Well, as much as we could.

We were so relieved
to see everyone safely released
from the Archives.

They were spared
the worst of it, at least.

Because of that, everyone got
to reunite with their families
and loved ones.

[Luz] And if someone
thought they had no one
waiting for them,

well, they were in
for a nice surprise.

Still, there was a lot
of rebuilding to be done...

and not everyone was keen
to change things.

But we were ready
to give it a shot.

he and I made a pinky promise
to keep trying our best.

He said he had a lot
of growing up to do,

so he decided
to return to the stars.

[Luz]
No one argued, but I think
I heard King whisper,

We got our happy ending,
but I realized something
in that moment.

When the Titan
had finally passed on,
so did the powers of the glyphs.

I had learned
the Titan's language,

but now I had no one
to speak it to.

It had helped me find my place
when I had no other way.

In my heart,
I'll never forget it.

A whole chapter
of my life was over...

...but a new one
was just beginning.

[sighs] I can't believe
you're already leaving
for college.

Remind me.
What major did you pick again?

You know me.
I picked all of 'em.

How is that even possible
without your glyphs?
It's been tough.

But me and Stringbean
figured out our own way
of doing things.

And it'll be nice
to finally see everyone again,

It's time.
[whispers]
Go get the others.

[Collector]
Welcome to the Boiling Isles.
Watch your step.

No one's gonna be mad
if we're a little late.

Well, since you spent
your 15th birthday

We wanted
to make it up to you.

Camila told us all
about your quinceañeras
from the Human Realm.

And they sounded
a lot less haunted
than our birthdays. [chuckles]

Nevertheless,
I made sure we followed
Camila's instructions perfectly.

Yeah, and it looks
like they're different
from his dad's.

But hey, you've got
a whole new glyph language
to try out.

The Collector
was in the area,
and, well,

he wanted to do
something special
for the occasion.

Eda, King,
thank you for everything.

Okay, everyone.
On the count of three.
